common.title: Free Image Compressor

common.footer: © 2026 Image Compressor. All images are processed in the browser and are not sent to the server.

dropZone.title: Drag and drop images here or click to select
dropZone.subtitle: You can select multiple images at once

directToWebP.title: Convert directly to WebP without compression
directToWebP.description: Convert images to WebP format without compression

webp.title: Convert to WebP
webp.tooltipDescription: WebP is a modern image format developed by Google. It provides the same quality as JPEG or PNG with 25-35% smaller file sizes. Supported by most modern browsers, it can significantly improve website loading speeds.

seo.title: Free Image Compressor - Online Image Optimization Tool
seo.description: Compress and optimize images for free on the web. Fast and easy image compression tool. Processed directly in your browser for privacy protection.
seo.keywords: image compression, image optimization, online compressor, free compression, image resize, web image optimization
